light_cleaned_title: Need help of special educators to fill a questionnaire
light_cleaned_selftext: Hi guys, my friend is doing research on disability and education and need some responses for her questionnaire regarding it. If any of you are special educators for intellectual disability, can you take a few minutes to answer a few questions? Your help is greatly appreciated,[here's the link for the questionnaire](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeptx6jMArasQZYUXsb1pW96YAezQ_y4n2pU2OTlkK3Veuhmw/viewform?usp=sf_link)`h` ​ ​
